name: The ring of the Necromancer
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It allows the user to see in darkness.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'chain'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'control'.
It modifies the user's spell knowledge.
